citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a written program for environment enhancement for their turkeys, quail, and peafowl. A facility
representative has been providing the birds with regular enrichment opportunities, however, a documented program has
not been developed.
A written plan for environment enrichment is necessary to ensure the psychological well-being and overall health of the
birds.
Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow a species- appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to
promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and must address
social grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, and exemptions.
Correct by: December 7, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have a written program for environment enhancement for their turkeys, quail, and peafowl. A facility 
representative has been providing the birds with regular enrichment opportunities, however, a documented program has 
not been developed. 
A written plan for environment enrichment is necessary to ensure the psychological well-being and overall health of the 
birds. 
Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow a species- appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to 
promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and must address 
social grouping, environmental enrichment, special considerations, and exemptions. 
Correct by: December 7, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
